languages.text: {n}Джай глубоко вздыхает, будто готовится к прыжку.{/n} "Потому что я была с ним прежде. Он помог мне перебраться в Простор из Каликсиса, сделать имя в Миссии, стать хладным торговцем, занять место погибшего Кристо... но не только это. Он был моим учителем. И моим любовником. Он знал все о моем прошлом... как и ты. Я долго была подле него, принадлежала ему душой и сердцем, но затем захотела иной жизни и ушла. Не исключаю, что попутно я разбила ему сердце".

{n}Jae takes a deep breath as though preparing to jump.{/n} "Because I was with him, before. He helped me relocate to the Expanse from the Calixis. And he helped me make a name for myself in the Mission, to become a Cold Trader, to take Cristo's place when he died... But it was more than that. He was my teacher. And my lover. He knew everything about my past... like you do now. I was with him for a long time, I belonged to him heart and soul, but later I wanted a different life, so I left. I can't say for certain that I didn't break his heart as I went."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай глубоко вздыхает, будто готовится к прыжку.{/n} "Потому что я была с ним прежде. Он помог мне перебраться в Простор из Каликсиса, сделать имя в Миссии, стать хладным торговцем, занять место погибшего Кристо... но не только это. Он был моим учителем. И моим любовником. languages.text: {n}婕伊深吸了一口气，仿佛做好了从悬崖上一跃而下的准备。{/n}“因为我之前和他在一起，是他帮助我从卡利西斯来到科罗努斯扩区，是他帮我混出了名堂，让我当上了冷市商人。而克里斯托死了之后，也是他帮我接手了克里斯托的生意……而且，不仅如此。他曾是我的导师，也是我的恋人。他对我过去的一切了如指掌……正如你一样。我和他在一起很长时间，我曾全心全意地爱过他。但后来，我想要不一样的生活，于是我便离开了。我不确定我离开的时候，有没有伤到他的心。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath as though preparing to jump.{/n} "Because I was with him, before. He helped me relocate to the Expanse from the Calixis. And he helped me make a name for myself in the Mission, to become a Cold Trader, to take Cristo's place when he died... But it was more than that. He was my teacher. And my lover. He knew everything about my past... like you do now. I was with him for a long time, I belonged to him heart and soul, but later I wanted a different life, so I left. I can't say for certain that I didn't break his heart as I went."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイはまるで、飛び込む前に心を整えるように深呼吸をする。{/n}「あたしは以前、彼と一緒にいたんだ。彼はキカリクシスからエクスパンスへの移住を手伝ってくれた。そして、聖務団であたしが名を挙げて、クリストが死んだときにその後を継いでコールド・トレーダーになるのを手伝ってくれた…でも、あたしにとって彼はそれ以上の存在だったんだ。彼は師であり恋人でもあったからね。彼はあたしの過去をすべて知っていた…今のあんたのように。長い間、彼に心と魂を捧げていたんだ。でも、その後、あたしは違う人生が欲しくなって、彼のもとを離れた。それが彼の心を壊さなかったとは断言できないけどね」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath as though preparing to jump.{/n} "Because I was with him, before. He helped me relocate to the Expanse from the Calixis. And he helped me make a name for myself in the Mission, to become a Cold Trader, to take Cristo's place when he died... But it was more than that. He was my teacher. And my lover. He knew everything about my past... like you do now. I was with him for a long time, I belonged to him heart and soul, but later I wanted a different life, so I left. I can't say for certain that I didn't break his heart as I went."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae respira profundamente como si se dispusiera a saltar.{/n} «Porque estuvimos juntos anteriormente. Me ayudó a trasladarme a la Extensión desde Calixis. Y me ayudó a crearme nombre en la misión, a convertirme en Comerciante Fría, a ocupar el puesto de Cristo cuando murió... y era más que eso. Era mi mentor. Y mi amante. Lo sabía todo sobre mi pasado... como usted ahora. Estuve con él mucho tiempo, era suya en cuerpo y alma. Pero luego quise una vida diferente y me marché. No puedo estar segura de no haberle roto el corazón».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath as though preparing to jump.{/n} "Because I was with him, before. He helped me relocate to the Expanse from the Calixis. And he helped me make a name for myself in the Mission, to become a Cold Trader, to take Cristo's place when he died... But it was more than that. He was my teacher. And my lover. He knew everything about my past... like you do now. I was with him for a long time, I belonged to him heart and soul, but later I wanted a different life, so I left. I can't say for certain that I didn't break his heart as I went."

Y me ayudó a crearme nombre en la misión, a convertirme en Comerciante Fría, a ocupar el puesto de Cristo cuando murió... y era más que eso. Era mi mentor. Y mi amante. Lo sabía todo sobre mi pasado... como usted ahora. Estuve con él mucho tiempo, era suya en cuerpo y alma. Pero luego quise una vida diferente y me marché. No puedo estar segura de no haberle roto el corazón».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae prend une profonde inspiration, comme si elle s'apprêtait à sauter.{/n} « Parce que je l'ai accompagné par le passé. Il m'a aidée à quitter Calixis pour venir m'installer dans les Étendues. C'est aussi grâce à lui que j'ai réussi à me faire un nom dans la Mission, à me spécialiser dans le Commerce Froid, ou encore à prendre la place de Cristo à sa mort... Mais plus que ça encore, c'était mon mentor. Et mon amant. Il savait tout de mon passé... comme vous aujourd'hui. Nous sommes restés longtemps ensemble, je lui appartenais corps et âme, mais j'ai fini par rêver d'une autre vie, alors je suis partie. Et je ne suis pas sûre de ne pas lui avoir brisé le cœur en le laissant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath as though preparing to jump.{/n} "Because I was with him, before. He helped me relocate to the Expanse from the Calixis. And he helped me make a name for myself in the Mission, to become a Cold Trader, to take Cristo's place when he died... But it was more than that. He was my teacher. And my lover. He knew everything about my past... like you do now. I was with him for a long time, I belonged to him heart and soul, but later I wanted a different life, so I left. I can't say for certain that I didn't break his heart as I went."

Et je ne suis pas sûre de ne pas lui avoir brisé le cœur en le laissant. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae atmet tief ein, als würde sie gleich losspringen wollen.{/n} "Weil wir zusammen eine Vorgeschichte haben. Er half mir, vom Calixis-Sektor in die Ausdehnung überzusiedeln. Und er half mir, mir in der Mission einen Namen zu machen, eine Kalthändlerin zu werden und Cristos Platz einzunehmen, als er starb ... Aber das ist noch nicht alles. Er war mein Lehrer. Und mein Geliebter. Er wusste alles aus meine Vergangenheit ... so wie Ihr. Ich war lange Zeit mit ihm zusammen und ihm mit Leib und Seele verschrieben. Irgendwann sehnte ich mich nach einem anderen Leben, also ging ich. Ich kann nicht mit Gewissheit sagen, dass ich ihm dabei nicht sein Herz brach."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath as though preparing to jump.{/n} "Because I was with him, before. He helped me relocate to the Expanse from the Calixis. And he helped me make a name for myself in the Mission, to become a Cold Trader, to take Cristo's place when he died... But it was more than that. He was my teacher. And my lover. He knew everything about my past... like you do now. I was with him for a long time, I belonged to him heart and soul, but later I wanted a different life, so I left. I can't say for certain that I didn't break his heart as I went."

Irgendwann sehnte ich mich nach einem anderen Leben, also ging ich. Ich kann nicht mit Gewissheit sagen, dass ich ihm dabei nicht sein Herz brach."

languages.text: {n}Jae, bir yerden atlamaya hazırlanıyormuş gibi derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Çünkü önceden onunla birlikteydim. Calixis'ten Enginlik'e yerleşmeme yardım etti. Misyon'da isim yapmama, Soğuk Tacir olmama, öldüğünde Cristo'nun yerini almama yardım etti. Gerçi bundan fazlası da var. O benim öğretmenimdi. Bir de sevgilim. Geçmişimle ilgili her şeyi biliyordu. Tıpkı şu an senin bildiğin gibi. Uzun zaman boyunca onunlaydım, kalben ve ruhen ona aittim ama daha sonra farklı bir hayat arzulayıp yanından ayrıldım. Gidişimle kalbini kırmadığım konusunda da pek emin sayılmam."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath as though preparing to jump.{/n} "Because I was with him, before. He helped me relocate to the Expanse from the Calixis. And he helped me make a name for myself in the Mission, to become a Cold Trader, to take Cristo's place when he died... But it was more than that. He was my teacher. And my lover. He knew everything about my past... like you do now. I was with him for a long time, I belonged to him heart and soul, but later I wanted a different life, so I left. I can't say for certain that I didn't break his heart as I went."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae bir yerden atlamaya hazırlanıyormuş gibi derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Çünkü önceden onunla birlikteydim. Calixis'ten Enginlik'e yerleşmeme yardım etti. Misyon'da isim yapmama, bir Soğuk Tacir olmama, öldüğünde Cristo'nun yerini almama da yardım etti. Ama bundan daha fazlası da var. O benim öğretmenimdi. Ve de sevgilim. Geçmişimle ilgili her şeyi biliyordu. Tıpkı şu an senin bildiğin gibi. Uzun zaman boyunca onunlaydım, kalben ve ruhen ona aittim ama daha sonra farklı bir yaşam arzuladım ve yanından ayrıldım. Gittiğimde kalbini kırmadığım konusunda da pek emin sayılmam."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
